dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.tip.nrf.TIPTerminationPoint
dataStructure.description:
This object class is the superclass of the CTP (ConnectionTerminationPoint) and PTP (PhysicalTerminationPoint) object classes. TP encapsulates object characteristics common to both CTPs and PTPs (i.e., common to end points (actual or potential) of Subnetwork Connections, Topological Links and Flow Domain Fragments). The layer rate of the TP is expressed in terms of the Transmission Parameters list attribute. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0005 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0006. For Connectionless Port Termination Points (CPTP) in connectionless network see R_TMF518_NRF_I_0016.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity does not generate Object Creation notifications (NA)

This entity does not generate Object Deletion notifications (NA)

This entity does not generate Object Discovery notifications (NA)
dataStructure.label: TIPTerminationPoint

child.name: direction
child.description:
This attribute represents a static, inherent capability of the TP.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: direction

child.name: tpProtectionAssociation
child.description:
This attribute indicates whether the TP has an associated protection TP and, if so, what kind of protection association exists.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: tpProtectionAssociation

child.name: isEquipmentProtected
child.description:
This attribute indicates whether or not the TP is supported by a protected Equipment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: isEquipmentProtected

child.name: egressTmdState
child.description:
This attribute contains the state of consistency between a TP and its associated egress TransmissionDescriptor.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: egressTmdState

child.name: ingressTmdState
child.description:
This attribute contains the state of consistency between a TP and its associated ingress TransmissionDescriptor.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: ingressTmdState

child.name: transmissionParameterList
child.description:
This attribute contains the layered Transmission Parameters associated with the different layers that are encapsulated within the TP. Refer to attached supporting document SD1-16_LayeredParameters for details of the currently defined Transmission Parameters

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: transmissionParameterList

child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See R_TMF518_NRB_I_0001 and R_TMF518_NRB_I_0004. See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: isEdgePoint
child.description:
This attribute indicates if the TP is an edge point of at least one Subnetwork or Flow Domain, i.e. if it is an end point of a potential inter-Subnetwork/inter-FlowDomain Topological Link. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0008.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: isEdgePoint

child.name: egressTmdRef
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association EgressTmdIsAssignedToTp

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC enabled
child.label: egressTmdRef

child.name: ingressTmdRef
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association IngressTmdIsAssignedToTp

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC enabled
child.label: ingressTmdRef

child.name: asapRef
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association TerminationPointHas

This association end is optional
child.label: asapRef

child.name: terminationPointPool
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association TpPoolContainsTps

This association end is optional
child.label: terminationPointPool
